Name: サブリミナルレジオン
About the game: Story 2018, the world of after a lapse of eight years from the faith collapse. Three young sorcerers belonging to the Ministry of Defense Special Armed Forces-Michiharu Yoshimuro, Kazuya Inaba, and Mizuki Kurauchi were tasked with resolving the square-related cases that occurred around the same time. As they perform their duties, the members will remember their own past and face it again. On the other hand, the Special Armed Forces Headquarters found a strange common point in each mission-- The first game of Sorcerer’s Records Series Season 3 is here! Check out the story of Sorcerer's Records, which is more mature than ever! Introduction This game is a standard lower window novel game for men of all ages. The scenario itself is a straight road, but it branches into three routes depending on the character's point of view. Attention Please note that if the game is updated, the previous save data may not be available.
